title: Samsung Galaxy S22 FE could feature a MediaTek SoC as Exynos chips continue to lose ground
content:
Samsung has historically released its flagship phones in two flavors: one variant featuring its in-house Exynos chipset and the other packing the equivalent Qualcomm Snapdragon chip. The Galaxy S21 FE, released earlier this year, also followed the same path, with Samsung offering both Exynos and Snapdragon variants based on the region. But it seems the

The post Samsung Galaxy S22 FE could feature a MediaTek SoC as Exynos chips continue to lose ground appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According a new report, Samsung will release the Galaxy S22 FE with a MediaTek chipset instead of using its own Exynos chip.
